title: Please I need help figuring out this font?
author: Sulema07

comments.content:
Any ideas what the the font used here is? Its not Bank Gothic??  
Thank You!
Find My Font says it is Fireye GF 3 (Bold) from [Dafont].
Next time try posting on the [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414214026/http:/typophile.com/typeid) that's meant for such questions.
